page.title: 12Farming
page.content:
There are quite a lot of farms in our area and one of them is Wiggonlea Farm.It has 133 acres of land.50 acres is for silage,10 acres is for arable crops,another 30 is for barley and 43 for pasture.Wiggonlea Farm had quite a few cows to go to market for meat.Lots of the farms aren't really farms at all,infact some are deserted.Packhorse Farm is a cottage.In the 1800's Packhorse Cottage kept gunpowder for Crich quarry.The powder was taken along the road by donkeys.That is how Jackass Lane got its name.Round Packhorse Cottage,all the fields belong to different people.Some are farmers,some are landowners,and some just make money from the crops they grow there.
{
